backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing user profiles, business cards, saved content, ideas, and reminders with role-based access control. Includes a public endpoint getBusinessCardByPrincipal for unauthenticated business card retrieval.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three implemented features: shareable business card URLs with a Share button, a public business card view page, and copy-to-clipboard functionality with visual feedback.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of frontend files including routing logic for public card pages, React Query hooks for backend operations, animated UI components, and utility functions for URL parameter parsing.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with design tokens for light and dark themes, including color variables for UI elements, charts, and sidebar components using OKLCH color space.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the CardVault React application with viewport configuration and module script reference.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component handling authentication flow, profile setup, and routing logic that detects public card routes to render PublicBusinessCardPage without authentication.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Authentication button component managing Internet Identity login/logout with loading states and query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog for initial user profile setup requiring name and optional email, with form validation and animated entrance.
frontend/src/components/content/Bookmark: Dialog form component for creating and editing bookmarks with title and URL fields, using ContentType enum and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/content/SavedCon: Dialog form component for creating and editing saved content items with tabs for link or text input, using React Query mutations for create/update operations.
frontend/src/components/empty-states/Emp: Reusable empty state component that displays an image, title, and description with fade-in and float animations.
frontend/src/components/ideas/IdeaForm.t: Dialog form component for creating and editing ideas with a textarea input, using React Query mutations for persistence.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main application layout component that manages navigation state and renders different pages (BusinessCard, SavedContent, Bookmarks, Ideas, Reminders) with header and bottom navigation.
frontend/src/components/layout/BottomNav: Fixed bottom navigation bar with five sections (Card, Content, Links, Ideas, Tasks) using icons and active state styling.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Sticky header component displaying the current section title with icon, user profile name, and login button.
frontend/src/components/loading/Skeleton: Collection of skeleton loading components (SkeletonCard, SkeletonList, SkeletonForm) for displaying placeholder UI during data fetching.
frontend/src/components/reminders/Remind: Dialog form component for creating and editing reminders with content, optional due date/time fields, and React Query mutations for persistence.
frontend/src/components/share/ShareCardD: Dialog component for sharing business card URLs with copy-to-clipboard functionality and toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that manages the backend actor instance with Internet Identity authentication, creating authenticated or anonymous actors and invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for managing user profiles, business cards, saved content, ideas, and reminders with CRUD operations and toast notifications.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom design tokens (colors, spacing), utility classes for animations and interactions, and keyframe definitions for fade/slide/scale effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/BookmarksPage.tsx: Page component for displaying, creating, editing, and deleting bookmarks with empty states, loading skeletons, and a modal form interface.
frontend/src/pages/BusinessCardPage.tsx: Page component for creating and editing a digital business card with form fields for contact information, sharing functionality, and empty/loading states.
frontend/src/pages/IdeasPage.tsx: Displays a list of user ideas with create, edit, and delete functionality, including loading states, empty states, and formatted timestamps.
frontend/src/pages/PublicBusinessCardPag: Public-facing page that displays a business card by principal ID from the URL, with error handling for invalid or missing cards.
frontend/src/pages/RemindersPage.tsx: Manages reminders with tabs for upcoming, overdue, and completed items, supporting create, edit, delete, and toggle completion actions.
frontend/src/pages/SavedContentPage.tsx: Displays saved content items (links and text snippets) with CRUD operations, filtering for general content type only.
frontend/src/pages/SignInPage.tsx: Landing page with Internet Identity authentication, displaying the CardVault logo and sign-in button with loading state.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting URL parameters and detecting public card routes, including principal ID extraction from pathname.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom theme extensions including colors, shadows, animations, and typography plugin integration.
project_state.json: Project state tracking document defining a mobile-friendly web app for digital business cards with links, bookmarks, ideas, and in-app reminders. Contains 8 implemented features including Internet Identity authentication, persistent storage for user-scoped data, and mobile-first navigation with a distinctive visual theme.
